name: Golden Axe Idol - Escape The Room
name_original: Golden Axe Idol - Escape The Room
description:
◆Story

Golden Axe Idol Kimmy is going to collaborate with a newcomer idol Snow, and they are planning to play the game “Escape the Room”. However, they soon discover that there are erotic traps in it. Will they be able to beat it?

◆Gameplay

This is a simple text adventure game. We recommend playing “Golden Axe Idol” and “Hypnosis Prison” before playing this game.

◆Game Features

1. Engaging scenes that will surely satisfy your appetite.

2. A fun and entertaining adult dating sim.
3. A unique story set in the same universe as Golden Axe Idol and Hypnosis Prison.
4. The game is free to play
5. This short story contains approximately 10,000 words.

◆Author’s Note

This is a small, free game that features characters from “Golden Axe Idol” and “Hypnosis Prison”.
